scripts.publish-docs: npm run build-docs && cp -r docs _publish && cd _publish && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m "Update docs" && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am "Update docs" && git push https://github.com/lynx-json/jsua-material.git gh-pages --force && cd ../ && rm -rf _publish
scripts.test-browser: browserify test/index.js -t babelify > ./test-browser/bundle.js; node test-browser/server.js | bash test-browser/saucelabs.sh
scripts.test: npm run test-node; npm run test-browser
